I think I'll pass on this one. According to IMDB, the movie is 2hrs 18mins long. This cam is listed as 2hrs 3mins long. Normally I allow a shortage of 4-6 mins for the end credits since most cam jobs don't have them, 1 min for those "cammers" that miss the very beginning of the movie and 1 min to switch tapes...but 15 mins is somewhat of a stretch. Even if it's a good cam job, I don't want to risk missing something that's crucial to the plot. And before folks start crucifying me for this post...I'm only trying to help those that are like me...you'll get lost or confused if the wrong part is missing!
Thanks......

Won't touch the "negro pilot" descent into madness topic.  Phenomenally awful movie (even with non-cam, dvd quality would still be pitiful...kubrick couldn't have salvaged this pile of feces).  The christian element, per typical snotty hollyweird treatment, are portrayed as knuckle-dragging, slack jawed mongoloids.  Denzel's character parties nonstop jim morrison style throughout movie and 'finds redemption' at the end, blah blah.  Like a never ending AA meeting (the EIGHTH circle of hell).  Ignore 'nasirka' and 'milkyway77's links unless you enjoy viruses/malware/trojans, etc.  Ignore their rah-rah comments as well.  Just trying to save anyone else from a 2+ hour torture session with this monstrosity.
